title: Virtual Talk: Chicago Stories
hero_caption: Red Grooms. City of Chicago, 1967. Gift of Mrs. Maggy Magerstadt-Fisher. © 2018 Red Grooms / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York.
short_description:
This short conversation led by educator Nancy Chen features objects with compelling stories and relevant connections to Chicago’s past and present.

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.
list_description: Explore objects with connections to Chicago's past and present.
description:
This short conversation led by educator Nancy Chen features objects with compelling stories and relevant connections to Chicago’s past and present.

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.

Please note that the artwork featured on this page may not be discussed in the talk.
